course_description: This clinical course builds on beginner-level Family Nurse Practitioner student knowledge-base and clinical skills acquisition. Emphasis is on entry-level competence with assessment, diagnosis, and management of common health conditions encountered in the primary care setting and across the lifespan.
prerequisites: NRSG 701D and NRSG 704D and NRSG 706D as prerequisites, and NRSG 751D as co-requisite, or equivalent transfer credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 1817, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: A. Abiri, Status: Open
